channel.title: Injured Workers Unite - Blog
channel.description: Daily features, tools, and updates for injured workers and disability rights activists

item.title: Eye Oracle: Daily Corruption Reports
item.description: Every day, we publish a report on real government corruption. All cases from official sources. Every claim has a link so you can verify it yourself.

item.title: Rabbit Holes: Become Your Own Investigator
item.description: Don't just trust The EYE—verify everything yourself. We've compiled 11 categories of official government databases where you can search records, file FOI requests, track lobbying, and expose corruption.

item.title: Know Your Rights: Charter, CHRA, and UNCRPD
item.description: These are the laws that protect you. When bureaucrats violate your rights, knowing the specific sections gives you power. We break down the key protections in plain English.

item.title: All 12 Workers' Compensation Boards in Canada
item.description: Every province and territory has a WCB. We've compiled direct links to all of them, plus appeals tribunals and key resources for injured workers fighting for their benefits.

item.title: THE EYE ORACLE: Incorruptible Evidence-Driven Intelligence
item.description: THE EYE SEES ALL. THE EYE FORGETS NOTHING. THE EYE NEVER SLEEPS. Our unified system monitors government sources 24/7, translates legalese to plain English, and archives everything for transparency.

item.title: Welcome to Injured Workers Unite
item.description: We're an independent activist platform fighting for disability rights, workers' rights, and social justice in Canada. 100% transparent, zero tracking, evidence-based advocacy.

item.title: How The Eye Oracle Exposes Government Corruption with Real Data
item.description: Discover how our AI-powered investigation system analyzes 89+ government datasets to uncover systemic corruption patterns affecting injured workers.

item.title: Memetic Warfare: How Memes Fight for Workers' Rights
item.description: Learn how viral content powered by real data amplifies the voices of injured workers and disabled persons across Canada.

item.title: 100% Real Data: Why We Never Use Mock Content
item.description: Transparency is our foundation. Learn how we verify every piece of data and why we refuse to use fake examples.

item.title: GitHub Actions: Automating the Fight for Justice
item.description: Behind the scenes: How we use GitHub Actions to fetch data every 6 hours, update content automatically, and deploy changes—all for $0.00.

item.title: Brave Rewards: How We Earn Passive Income Without Ads
item.description: Learn how we generate sustainable income for our activism without compromising privacy or using intrusive ads.
